perturbation.original_text: 10.1 Term. This Agreement shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall continue in force for three years from the Launch Date (the "Initial Term") unless earlier terminated in accordance with this Section (the "Term"). The Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one year additional terms unless terminated by either party at least six months prior to the expiration of the then-current term.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.1 Term. This Agreement shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall continue in force for three years from the Launch Date (the "Initial Term") unless earlier terminated in accordance with this Section (the "Term"). The Agreement will renew each year only if both parties give written consent 30 days prior to the renewal date; otherwise, this agreement will not be extended.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement will automatically renew unless terminated by either party. The modified text requires explicit consent from both parties for the renewal, creating a contradiction in terms regarding the renewal process.

perturbation.original_text: 3.5 Know-How. The parties hereby acknowledge and agree that any and all rights to Know-How developed or shared under this Agreement by either party shall be jointly owned by the parties and may be used by either party in the operation of their respective businesses during and following termination of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.5 Know-How. The parties hereby acknowledge and agree that any and all rights to Know-How developed or shared under this Agreement by either party shall be solely owned by PlanetCAD and may be used only by PlanetCAD following termination of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Know-How developed or shared is jointly owned and can be used by either party. The modified version changes the ownership to solely PlanetCAD's and restricts usage post-termination, contradicting the original joint ownership agreement and creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text:
5.4 Share of Net Revenue. As financial consideration under this Agreement, Net Revenue will be shared by the parties as follows:
                  (a)   For so long as PlanetCAD hosts the Co-Branded Service,
                        during which time PlanetCAD shall be the Billing Party,
                        all Net Revenue derived from sales of the Co-Branded
                        Service to Dassault Systemes Customers shall be
                        apportioned [***] percent ([***]%) to Dassault Systems
                        and [***] percent ([***]%) to PlanetCAD.
                  (b)   In the event that Dassault Systemes opts to host the
                        Co-Branded Service pursuant to Section 4.7  [Change of Hosting] herein they
                        shall become the Billing Party and all Net Revenue
                        derived from sales of the Co-Branded Service shall be
                        apportioned [***] percent ([***]%) to Dassault Systems
                        and [***] percent ([***]%) to PlanetCAD.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4 Share of Net Revenue. As financial consideration under this Agreement, Net Revenue will be shared at the discretion of the Billing Party. The Billing Party will determine the distribution of Net Revenue on a quarterly basis, taking into account market conditions and operational expenses. The Non-Billing Party may appeal the distribution, but the final decision rests with the Billing Party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides a clear apportionment of net revenue between the parties. The changed text introduces ambiguity by giving the Billing Party full discretion over revenue sharing, directly contradicting the defined percentages and creating uncertainty regarding the financial obligations of the agreement.
